Actions.Text: REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Relates to the motor vehicle exemption and the homestead exemption for certain money judgments and bankruptcy proceedings
Summary: Relates to the calculation of the homestead exemption amount; relates to the indexing of the homestead exemption for housing value changes; increases the amount of the motor vehicle exemption; limits the homestead exemption available to bankruptcy debtors to one exemption per household; increases the motor vehicle exemption available in bankruptcy proceedings.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules and the debtor and creditor law, in relation to the motor vehicle exemption and the homestead exemption for certain money judgments and bankruptcy proceedings
